comment: * Columns for the "threads" table used by MMS and SMS.

variables.name: DATE
variables.comment:
* The date at which the thread was created. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

variables.name: RECIPIENT_IDS
variables.comment:
* A string encoding of the recipient IDs of the recipients of * the message, in numerical order and separated by spaces. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: MESSAGE_COUNT
variables.comment:
* The message count of the thread. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: READ
variables.comment:
* Indicates whether all messages of the thread have been read. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: SNIPPET
variables.comment:
* The snippet of the latest message in the thread. *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: SNIPPET_CHARSET
variables.comment:
* The charset of the snippet. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: TYPE
variables.comment:
* Type of the thread, either {@link Threads#COMMON_THREAD} or * {@link Threads#BROADCAST_THREAD}. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: ERROR
variables.comment:
* Indicates whether there is a transmission error in the thread. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: HAS_ATTACHMENT
variables.comment:
* Indicates whether this thread contains any attachments. *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: ARCHIVED
variables.comment:
* If the thread is archived *

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

variables.name: SUBSCRIPTION_ID
variables.comment:
* The subscription to which the message belongs to. Its value will be less than 0 * if the sub id cannot be determined. *

Type: INTEGER (long)

* @hide
